H채lsa v채lkommen Ten Points

‹ back to news overview
Apps4Fashion warmly welcomes Ten Points! With this amazing Swedish manufacturer another footwear brand has selected our sales tools for a professional, efficient and secure mobile order entry as add-on to their back office system (Navision).
Together with our Swedish partner NaviPro we look forward to a pleasant and successful collaboration. Ten Points is a Swedish footwear brand established 1983 with a difference. In a world obsessed with shortcuts, they walk the road less travelled. Every pair that wears the Ten Points logo is designed and made by hand in Europe, using sustainable production methods and fair business practices. That’s why the shoes not only make you look great. They actually make you feel better as well.

Apps4Fashion is the leading international provider of mobile sales tools for Apparel, Sports, Footwear, Body Fashion, Accessory, Home & Living brands, agents and distributors. Currently over 300 international brands and suppliers like Scotch & Soda, Julie Brandt, By Malene Birger, Peak Performance, J.Lindeberg, Lexington, O'Neill, Haglöfs, Asics, Fila, Pantofola d'Oro, Le Coq Sportif, Val Sport, Bullboxer, Sketchers, HUB Footwear, Gram shoes, Rehab, Royal Republiq, Ca'Shott, Noë Antwerp and many more.

Our platform and sales tools have been successfully integrated with all kind of ERP, PIM and other back 0ffice systems like SAP, several versions of Navision, Microsoft Dynamics NAV,  Microsoft Dynamics AX, Concorde, XAL, Garp, Exact,  M3, Softwear, Trimmit, K3 Pebblestone Fashion, XL-Enz, It Suits Fashion, C5, Styleman, ACA, Becosoft, Apparel21, DiatexNT, E-conomic, InRiver etc.

We are happy to explain you more about Apps4Fashion and demonstrate what it can do for you. For more information www.apps4fashion.com or email torobert@apps4fashion.com
Official Apps4Fashion partners are Agidon A/S (Denmark), Dekon IT AS (Norway) and GC Support AS (Norway/Sweden), NaviPro AB (Sweden) and  Impuls Software Systeme GmbH (Germany/Austria/Switzerland)
